info.name: Dark Dropbox by GexideL
info.description: Dark theme for Dropbox. This theme is updated once a week / when needed! If you find any imperfections please write below in discussion.
info.additionalInfo: 02. 02. 2020 - Bugfix 1.09 Fixed elements on overview. ---------- 22. 11. 2019 - Bugfix 1.08 Fixed elements on details. ---------- 07. 09. 2019 - Bugfix 1.07 Fixed some elements, new search and page about security. ---------- 22. 07. 2019 - Bugfix 1.06 Fixed Add to Dropbox pop-up. ---------- 11. 07. 2019 - Bugfix 1.05 Fixed text/html and error preview. Some buttons and landing page box. ---------- 04. 07. 2019 - Bugfix 1.04 Fixed dropbox rewind icons, deleted items, and some minor adjustments. ---------- 08. 06. 2019 - Bugfix 1.03 Fixed dropbox rewind, fixed profile settings, fixed some content elements. ---------- 20. 05. 2019 - Bugfix 1.02 Fixed all remaining content pages, so they match the dark theme. ---------- 16. 05. 2019 - Bugfix 1.01 Fixed "Create folder" modal, some small changes to footer and fix for scrollbar. ---------- 15. 05. 2019 - Release 1.00 First release of Dark theme for Dropbox. Inlcudes full dark dropbox web application and some content pages.
